dct_title_s: Nova et Accurata Totius Americae Tabula
dct_description_sm: America is derived from the 1st state of Fredrick de Witâ€™s 1672 wall map.

Cartouche title: America; Large cartouche in lower left surrounded by depictions of natives and Europeans with a portrait of the King (most likely William) at top.; Vignette at right shows a depiction of a native procession and daily life, including a lama being ridden.; Includes a decorative polar projection in upper left, surrounded by heavenly figures and with a small banner cartouche inside the neatline.; Includes illustrations of animals and human figures on the South American continent.
California shown as a labeled island with an indented northern coast and many place names.
Includes bibliographical references (p. xv-xvi) and indexes.
apud Gerard Valk Cum Privilegio Ordinum Hollandiae et West-Frisae
Glen McLaughlin with Nancy H. Mayo.
